# Pull Request

## Description
Brief description of changes and why they're needed.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] New test module (adds diagnostic coverage)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Code refactoring

## Related Issue
Fixes #(issue number)

## Changes Made
- List specific changes
- Include file modifications
- Note any algorithm updates

## Testing
- [ ] Tested on VICE emulator
- [ ] Tested on real hardware (specify model: _______)
- [ ] All existing tests still pass
- [ ] No regressions introduced

### Test Configuration
- **VICE Version**: 
- **Hardware Model** (if tested): 
- **Special conditions tested**: 

## Screenshots/Output
If applicable, add screenshots showing:
- Before/after for bug fixes
- New features in action
- Test output changes

## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards (see CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] I've added comments for complex logic
- [ ] I've updated documentation as needed
- [ ] I've added attribution headers where required
- [ ] The build passes with `make clean && make`
- [ ] I've tested with marginal/faulty hardware if applicable

## Attribution
- [ ] I've maintained proper attribution to original Dead Test
- [ ] I've credited worldofjani.com disassembly where applicable
- [ ] Any third-party code is properly attributed

## Additional Notes
Any additional information that reviewers should know.
